rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming space with decorative arches inspired by Chettinad style and adherence to Vastu principles for positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open living area featuring floor-to-ceiling windows on the front facade to enhance natural light, with traditional Chettinad detailing.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the kitchen for functional flow; designed in a semi-open layout maintaining privacy and space utility.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Well-equipped with modern amenities yet integrating traditional finishes. The placement respects Vastu by being away from the main entrance.

rooms.name: Guest Toilet
rooms.description: For guests, ensuring convenience and privacy; strategically located near the living area for easy access.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: A quiet retreat with bookshelves embedded in walls, natural lighting from large windows, and a comfortable seating arrangement.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: Includes washing area; placed conveniently to support the main living spaces.
